quoteFirst: “Yes,” Sir Clinton explained. “She and friend Ernest went off in the car from the house at about
quoteLast: . At a quarter to four—just about the moment when the murders occurred—she was in a shop buying shoe-laces. That precludes any chance of her having used the car to get back to the Maze at the critical time.
title: Murder in the maze
author: Connington, J. J., 1880-1947
